description: Manages security group rules on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

icmp_code.description: Error code for this icmp message. Required if C(protocol=icmp).

protocol.description: Protocol of the security group rule.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

user_security_group.description: Security group this rule is based of.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

end_port.description: End port for this rule. Required if C(protocol=tcp) or C(protocol=udp), but C(start_port) will be used if not set.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the security group to be created in.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

state.description: State of the security group rule.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

security_group.description: Name of the security group the rule is related to. The security group must be existing.

start_port.description: Start port for this rule. Required if C(protocol=tcp) or C(protocol=udp).

cidr.description: CIDR (full notation) to be used for security group rule.

icmp_type.description: Type of the icmp message being sent. Required if C(protocol=icmp).

type.description: Ingress or egress security group rule.
